tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently started playing cricket again after years and my knee started giving me problem.  I stay abroad and during my visit to India I visited Dr Atul. 
Dr Atul was very quick to understand the problem. He was accurate in what he thought was wrong and he took the time to explain to me.  He didn't go for any xray as he was confident about the problem.
He advised me some exercises and minimum medicines.
The best part, I was always able to do my follow up online from my residing country. I highly recommend Dr Atul.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I met Dr Atul Patil for my ankle injury. He had suggested me physiotherapy to fully recover from the issue.

Post that I took my mom to meet him for her knee pain. After numerous visits to various doctors, she had decided that she won't undergo knee replacement surgery. But when we met Dr Patil, he explained the whole issue to her. He was thorough with his evaluation, kind, and informative. He suggested knee replacement for both her knees. But mom somehow agreed to go for right knee replacement. All this was done and agreed and within a week we went for operation in mid-March. Post operation he suggested physiotherapy. And today my mom is fully fit. She's goes for her walks and also climbs stairs. For any issues, Doctor is available to respond on phone or WhatsApp. Overall very happy with his treatment and would highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Every time I have had Orthopedic issues, ultimately I have consulted Dr. Atul Patil only. He has not only healed my problems in the most economical way but also taught me how to avoid issues in future. I am so proud to say that Dr. Atul Patil is blessed with superbly talanted hands by almighty and got a humble. I have no words to express his dedication, devotion and passion towards his work and firm stand to his decision.
With great pride and warm heart I proudly THANK Dr. Atul Patil and his team for standing with me and my family in the toughest time of our lives.
I recommend him only to all my friends and family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had visited Dr. Atul Patil for severe pack pain which was way much unbearable. Due to the severe pain i was very much troubled and requested doc for injection as a immediate  solution being a layman. Dr. Atul made me understand the real reasons for the pain n with proper guidance with x-rays n medicines i was able to get rid of the pain in few days.
He makes you understand the real reasons for your problem with easy language n you feel really positive around him.
I recommend Dr. Atul for your ortho related issues and you will be happy meeting him with his coolness as a person n expertise in his field.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Knee Pain Treatment,Joint and Muscle Problems,
review:
I had visited Dr. Atul patil for my mother knee and joints pain at Mulund east clinic. Initially he looks very friendly and caring ****** *** ***** *** *** ******** **** ***** ********* ******* for long term benifits Dr.Atul Patil has advise us to take Inj.Zaina by IV..(we were taking his treatment for more than 3 months and just for our comfort he asked us come at Mulund colony clinic where he had weekly two visits..meantime I have noticed many time that doctor has his own preferred medicines manufacturing company and he always insist to buy that Brand only....Yes it maybe effectiveness *** ****** *** *** * ******* ****
Let's talk about Inj. Zaina...when I approach my medical for this injection then he suggested me Inj. Rokfos by Cipla and asked me to get it checked by doctor....Rokfos is from Cipla and I was getting it in half Price of Zaina so I asked doctor whether we can go with this then Dr. Atul patil replied very ignorantly that we can take this...this is not normal injection we have to give prior order at medical so I did that and when actually I received injection and I approach Mulund colony clinic (before ordering I have taken Drs and clinic Manager consent) however that clinic Manager again asked me to get it confirm by doctor so I text him on WhatsApp and after no reply by 20 min then call him...Dr.Atul patil picked up call and told me very Rudly that take any injection and don't ask again and at the same time He told clinic Manager that if they are Not taking Our injection Zaina then ask them to leave and take that Rokfos injection from your family's Doctor.
First question?
1) If we want to take treatment from our family doctor then why did we approach you?

Second question?
2) If you don't want to use other brand injection then Why didn't you inform us initially?

Third question?
3) Do you have little courtesy and ownership toward your patients?****** *** *** **** ***** ********** **** ***** **** ******* ******* ******** ************* ********

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Horrific experience, when I went to remove my cast. The doctor used a sharp spinning metallic wheel - oscillating cutting saw to cut the cast. He badly injured me in several places, and I came back with multiple scars and bruises on my hand. I had to take a tetanus shot for this. **** ******* **** ** ** *********** ** ** *** ******* ** ****** * ***** Although he said it will not hurt me, he actually bruised me very badly, and when I complained that he was hurting me, he instead told me that I was moving my hand - but he didn’t understand that he was actually scratching my skin with that rotating device.  He doesn’t understand that if you scratch a person with a sharp saw, he will intuitively move. ** ****** ********** ***** ** *** **** ********** ***** ** *** **** ******** ****** **** ***** * ******* * ** **** **** **** ******* ***** ******* ** *** ************ Would definitely not recommend him to anyone - he doesn’t have the basic empathy ***** *** ***** ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He communicated us the facts, possible options and treatment immediately. He helped us understand the situation calmly. His positivity and smiling personality gave us confidence that everything will be perfectly fine. He is very punctual and committed. 
He is very cooperative, responsive and the implementation of his post operative care measures have shown drastic improvements in my mom’s operated elbow.
We had a great overall experience and would highly recommended anyone who is suffering from ortho problems ** ** ** *** **** **** ** *******

tags: None
review:
Dr Atul treated my problems with as much empathy as possible. He'd greet with a smile, listen patiently to my story, sift through relevant details, explain the cause and the treatment, making me a party in the process. And of course, the trademark goodbye smile. 

And the bare minimum fees of 500, with liberal interpretation of follow up consultations.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I took my mom to the bone clinic for the first time as her shoulder was dislocated and she was in acute pain.  She was attended to in less than 5 mins and all the staff was very responsive. Especially the doctor was very kind and patient with our queries and explained everything very clearly. He helped my mom recover without any surgery and it was a great relief. I highly recommend this doctor and also the clinic.
reply_text: Thank you for the generous reply

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I had my wrist fractured and required to operate it. Dr Atul Patil first explained us the detailed procedure, post operation rehabilitation and solved all our queries before operating me. Now after 2 months of surgery, as he said, I'm almost fully recovered and back to my routine activities. Completely satisfied with his treatment and highly recommended.

Second thing which put him in the category of good doctor is that he explains the use of every medicine in very nice manner.
He is good doctor indeed!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Atul was very friendly and explained the issue in detail. And most importantly he was able to reduce my pain and I was able to go back to work sooner than expected.He also recommended some exercises to be done post recovery.

I highly recommend him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: First and foremost, the doctor is sincere to welcome new patient. He ask full history of patient's health. Thereafter he give his advice. As per my knowledge he handles the patient meticulously. He speaks politely with patient so that the patient get confidence. I wish him success in his profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was satisfied with his line of treatment and I'm feeling very well after his prescribed medicines and ointment which he prescribed to apply...was very polite and was up to the point in matter of concern to knee injury.Would definitely recommend to my loved and deared ones in case they needed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have known Dr Atul for quite some time, having undergone treatment with him a number of times. He's even treated my  near and extended family. He listens to your problems with a lot of patience and interest and then lucidly explains the condition and treatment. I would highly recommend Dr Atul to whoever looking to get their ortho issues resolved..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr Atul Patil has been very helpful while treating my mom’s back pain. After examining the investigations he recommended physiotherapy by Kala Soni.

With regular physio exercise she doesn’t have the pain anymore.

Would highly recommend Dr. Atul Patil for chronic pains.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Atul Sir is very humble and down to earth person.
I visited his clinic for my wife's treatment.He answers the questions of patients so they can understand the condition of illness.He advised physiotherapy + Tens for my wife's problem.I will further meet him for advise after physiotherapy session is over.
I highly recommend this Dr for all your orthopedic related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I went for my mother's shoulder pain..She was unable to move her left shoulder and was facing pain almost for last 2-3 months..I met this doctor for first time and he examined the symptoms and heard the concerns carefully. He very well explained the cause and was very friendly in terms of answering the queries..A must recommended doctor!! Thanks 👍

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

The way he spoke I felt very much assured.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

Dr Atul Patil is *************, Efficient, friendly with the Patient & Relatives of Patient, Kind-hearted, Polite & Soft-spoken.
Operation for my Aunt was done at Hira Mongi Hospital in Mulund West, and the Operation was Successful.
Will recommend Dr Atul Patil for all Patients having Ortho problems.

I would strongly recommend those who reading my experience should atleast once visit Dr Atul clinic.

Rahul Shinde

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I had gone to the doc as my mom had severe knee pain. We were told she had a ligament tear. She was unable to walk. I must say within 15-20 days she felt better. *** *********** **** *** ********* *** she has recovered almost 90%.
I really want to thank the doctor again.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: I had wrist fracture 2 months ago for which doctor atul patil operated me with plates. and as by his comitments regarding healing of fracture and getting me back to my work, im completely happy. movements of my hand and wrist are almost back to normal. thanks to dr patil.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mother has a disease called carpal tunnel syndrome. Doctor Patil very nicely explained the disease and the need of surgery for it. He operated my mom and now,just after 1 day of surgery, she is 90% relieved from her problems. Very much helpful doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was operated for leg fracture by Dr.Atul Patil few months ago. Now i'm perfectly fine & able to walk pain and tension free . I would highly recommended Dr.Atul for surgeries. 
He is very cooperative, helpful and really warm towards his patients...

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,Wait time,
review:
Doc explained to me about my hand pain..I started with the treatment ..there were immediate results..my hand was much more  in recovery process..medicine were affordable and easily available in all chemist shops...I was assured that if at all the pain gets severe doc himself would be available at any point of time..

Thank you Dr.Atul

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
My grand mother had a fall in bathroom midnight when she had injured her knee very badly and also had a deep wound on her scalp. He called Dr Patil at 2am for the same, he arranged ambulance for us and called us in hospital. 
As my grandmother was taking blood thinners for heart issues, there was profuse bleeding from her scalp. Dr patil managed it very calmly and applied stitches on it. He explained us all the injuries in details at midnight and assured us nothing was serious. He did an emergency x ray at night where it was found that there was fracture around knee joint. Dr applied plaster and did all first aid management for that. 

Seriously i would recommend him for any bone related issues as he explains everything in details and patiently.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Atul Patil is saviour... I had taken second opinion for my mother treatment for spine as the the earlier doctor suggested only surgery is the option left .

I showed mri report to Dr. Atul Patil he recommended  Xray test and after seeing the report he suggested surgery is not required. He had detailed discussion with my Mom too. 

He explained very nicely to us and recommended medicine.. my mother is fine and we have next follow up 

Half of the stress is gone if you have right doctor ..
I have already recommended to my friends and relatives..

God Bless you Dr. Atul Patil

Regards
Gulnaz
reply_text: Thank u gulnaaz for the kind feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: “I want to express my gratitude to the extraordinary surgery that was performed on my back, which was a lumbar fusion. For years, I had tried different procedures, medications, and other doctors. Still, I was enduring severe pain, especially on my right leg. Today, only after two months since my surgery, I am very pleased with the results. The pain on my right leg has subsided. It feels like a miracle! My experience has been extremely positive. I credit this to the great effort and expertise of Dr. Atul Patil and his entire surgical team. This procedure has given me the ability to continue to maintain a healthier lifestyle. The result of my recent surgery is beyond my expectations. For any future patients that are experiencing decisions about this procedure, I wholeheartedly recommend it.  ”

He communicated us the facts, possible options and treatment immediately. He helped us understand the situation.

Dr. Atul Patil. is just not a good doctor, he is also a very good counclor.👍

Bhaskar Jadhav.
